A '''potato geode''' is a potato variant of an [[amethyst geode]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Generation ==
Potato geodes generate frequently underground both in the Overworld and in the [[Potato dimension]].

== Structure ==
Comparing to [[amethyst geode]]s:

* The outer layer of [[smooth basalt]] is replaced with [[cobblestone]].
* The middle layer of [[calcite]] is replaced with [[granite]]. Granite might be replaced with the ores such as [[Iron Ore|iron ore]] of the [[overworld]], even if the potato geode is generated in [[Poisonous Potato Dimension|potato]].

* The inner layer of [[blocks of amethyst]] is replaced with [[terre de pomme]].
* The [[budding amethyst]] blocks are replaced with [[poisonous potato block]]s.
